element.name: groupedProduct
element.selector: //li[not(preceding-sibling::li[span[@title='Virtual Product']]) and not(preceding-sibling::li[span[@title='Bundle Product']]) and not(preceding-sibling::li[span[@title='Downloadable Product']]) and not(following-sibling::li[span[@title='Simple Product']]) and not(following-sibling::li[span[@title='Configurable Product']])]/span[@title='Grouped Product']
